name: Extending Shared Reality in Downstream
description:
Worlds that exist on-chain are composable and interoperable by default, allowing people to build on top of what exists already.

But because of how plug-ins and mods work elsewhere, we tend to think of extensions as optional things that players can use to customise their individual experience.

Instead, we'll talk about how we've made extensions first class citizens, allowing people to update shared reality, not just their personal experience of it.

speakers.name: Luke Gibson
speakers.bio: Luke Gibson is one of the founders of Playmint, a game development studio working on Downstream, a fully on-chain extendable multiplayer game. Previously part of the team at Mediatonic / Epic that launched Fall Guys.
